select o.order_id,adr.address,o.status,o.price,s.shop_name,s.shop_no,o.remark, DATE_FORMAT(o.appointDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') appointDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.createDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.payDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') payDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.takeDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') takeDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.sendDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') sendDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.washDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') washDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.hangDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') hangDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.receiveDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') receiveDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.takeBackDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') takeBackDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.deliverDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') deliverDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.confirmDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') confirmDate, DATE_FORMAT(o.reviewDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') reviewDate from `order` o ,address adr ,laundry_shop s where 1 = 1 and o.state='00A' and o.addressId = adr.address_id and o.shopNo = s.shop_no
and o.status like concat(concat('%', #{status}), '%')
and o.order_id like concat(concat('%', #{orderId}), '%')
and o.shopNo = #{shopNo}

select o.order_id,o.status,o.price,s.shop_name from `order` o ,order_detail od ,customer c ,laundry_shop s where c.cust_id = od.cust_id and o.order_id = od.order_id and o.shopNo = s.shop_no and c.cust_id = #{custId} and o.state = '00A' GROUP BY o.order_id order by o.order_id desc

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS time, IFNULL(count(*),0) as count FROM `order` WHERE state = '00A' and DATE_FORMAT(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 30 DAY) and shopNo = #{shopNo} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(createDate,'%Y-%m-%d')
